nodes.title: Wan 2.2 Img2Vid - Long Video Length Generation (For Loop Structure) (Basic Version) (Ver. 20250902)

widgets_values: Cinematic scenes, high quality photography, photorealistic

Two dark magic witches stand beside an ancient stone pedestal in a misty garden, surrounded by rows of black roses that shimmer faintly under the soft daylight. One witch, dressed in a sleek black gown with long flowing hair, holds a glowing red vial, while the other, wearing a high-collared robe and cat-like ears, reaches out to receive it. The air is still, but a subtle energy hums between them as they exchange the potion, their eyes meeting with quiet intensity. Behind them, a massive, gnarled willow tree looms like a guardian of forgotten spells.

They place the vial on the stone table, which is covered with an open grimoire filled with arcane symbols. With synchronized movements, both witches raise their hands, palms facing upward, and begin to chant in unison. A faint blue aura begins to swirl around their fingers, and the pages of the book flutter despite no wind. The camera captures the growing tension in their expressions—focused, determined—as the first sparks of magical energy ignite from their fingertips, forming small orbs of light that float above the table.
As the spell intensifies, the garden erupts with magical effects—vines twist upward like serpents, and the black roses begin to glow with inner crimson light. The sky above shifts dramatically, clouds gathering and darkening as lightning forks across the horizon. Wind picks up suddenly, rustling the leaves and sending petals spiraling into the air. The witches continue their incantation, their voices rising in harmony, and the stone table pulses with power, emitting waves of energy that ripple through the ground.
The transformation accelerates—each black rose blooms into a floating orb of dark magic, suspended mid-air like lanterns of shadow and flame. These orbs drift slowly toward the center of the garden, forming a circular pattern around the witches. The sky now crackles with lightning, illuminating the scene in stark flashes, revealing the intricate tattoos on the witches’ arms glowing faintly. Their robes billow in the storm-wind, and their eyes shine with supernatural focus as the spell reaches its peak.
The witches join hands over the stone table, channeling their combined power into a single beam of dark energy that shoots upward into the stormy sky. The beam splits into multiple tendrils, each striking a different part of the garden—causing trees to grow twisted branches, flowers to burst into spectral flames, and the ground to ripple with unseen force. The air vibrates with soundless thunder, and the willow tree’s roots writhe beneath the soil as if awakening from slumber.
With a final breath, the witches release the spell, and the energy wave spreads outward in a radiant pulse, engulfing the entire garden. The orbs of light explode into showers of embers, and the sky clears briefly to reveal a swirling vortex of stars and darkness above. The witches step back, their faces calm and satisfied, as the transformed garden glows with an eerie beauty—black roses now pulsing with magic, the willow tree standing taller than before, and the world forever changed by their dark enchantment.

All files for Diffusion Models , Text Encoder, VAE : 

Wan_2.2_ComfyUI : https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/Wan_2.2_ComfyUI_Repackaged/tree/main

GGUF : https://huggingface.co/QuantStack/Wan2.2-I2V-A14B-GGUF/tree/main

Use "Image2Video Model"

Load Diffusion Model connect to TorchCompileModel

Or for Low VRAM ====> GGUF

Unet Loader (GGUF) + WanVideoBlockSwap
 connect to TorchCompileModel.

Use "Image2Video Model"

Load Diffusion Model connect to TorchCompileModel

Or for Low VRAM ====> GGUF

Unet Loader (GGUF) + WanVideoBlockSwap
 connect to TorchCompileModel.
色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走

<<< For Sampling - Part 1 , Text prompt only.  

Extend Video Text prompts , use "Travel Prompt for Extend Video"

Travel Prompt Should be based on Number Of Extend.

One row = One Prompt

Press Enter to write another line = Text Prompt for another Video Extend.

E.g: 

726 Total Frames , FPS 25
= 29 Seconds video

If we use 121 frames for each sampling
= 6 video sampling times

No. 1 >>> Sampling - Part 1

No. 2-6 >>>> In Video Extend Loop

groups.title: Step 2 - Travel Prompt for Extend Video
